step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to bring your shoulder blades closer together as you begin the roll.
Excellent! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades down and back, completing the circular motion.
Great job on the first repetition! Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Good continuation. Keep the movement controlled and focus on the shoulder blade squeeze.
Nice work! Ensure the downward motion is as deliberate as the backward squeeze.
Fantastic finish! You're effectively improving shoulder mobility and supporting lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Breathing deeply as you pull back helps improve oxygen flow. Keep up the excellent work on regaining shoulder mobility!
